alert.note: Alert for Chester; Decatur; Hardin; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:19PM CDT until July 18 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Henderson County in west Tennessee... Central Hardin County in west Tennessee... East central Chester County in west Tennessee... Decatur County in west Tennessee... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 419 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Decaturville, or 17 miles southeast of Lexington, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Savannah, Parsons, Decaturville, Sardis, Walnut Grove, Reagan, Olive Hill, Montgomery, Scotts Hill, Saltillo, Busseltown, Phillips, Haney, Hinkle, Roby, Pleasant Grove, Mount Tabor, Red Walnut, Olivehill and Cerro Gordo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
